text: isee sabab se to hamane banee isaraeel par vaajib kar diya tha ki jo shakhs kisee ko na jaan ke badale mein aur na mulk mein fasaad phailaane kee saza mein (balki naahaq) qatl kar daalega to goya usane sab logon ko qatl kar daala aur jisane ek aadamee ko jila diya to goya usane sab logon ko jila liya aur un (banee isaraeel) ke paas to hamaare paigambar (kaise kaise) raushan maujize lekar aa chuke hain (magar) phir usake baad bhee yaqeenan usamen se bahutere zameen par jyaadatiyo karate rahe
